name: CodEnvision Softwares Private Limited
work: As a skilled Senior Software Developer with over 4 years of experience, I specialize in creating high-performance web and mobile applications using modern frameworks and technologies.
Developed and maintained responsive UI components using React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript.
Built scalable and maintainable front-end architectures from scratch for various SaaS and client platforms.
Integrated RESTful APIs and CMS platforms like Strapi to power dynamic, data-driven web apps.
Collaborated closely with designers using Figma to ensure pixel-perfect UI implementation.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and performance optimization through clean, semantic HTML/CSS and Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and SCSS.
Implemented reusable component libraries using Material UI to streamline development and maintain design consistency.
Improved page load speed and Core Web Vitals through code splitting, lazy loading, and performance best practices.
Worked in Agile teams using Git/GitHub for version control and daily standups for progress tracking.
Wrote unit and integration tests for UI components using testing frameworks to ensure stability and scalability.
Contributed to UI/UX decisions, suggesting design improvements and maintaining usability standards across devices.

name: La Net Team Software Solutions Pvt. LTD.
work: Led full project lifecycle from requirement analysis to deployment and maintenance, delivering robust web applications across multiple domains.
Engineered full-stack solutions with React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, C#, and JavaScript, integrating APIs like Stripe, Firebase, and Mitto (SMS/IVRS).
Built dynamic and reusable frontend components in React and Next.js, implemented client-side validations, and wrote unit/UI test cases using modern testing frameworks.
Created custom UI tools such as dynamic table builders, enhanced user experiences, and followed responsive design best practices for cross-device compatibility.

name: Medionce Solutions Private Limited
work: Designed and developed visually engaging and user-friendly websites aligned with client objectives and brand identity.
Handled both technical and graphical aspects of web development, ensuring responsive and accessible designs.
Collaborated with stakeholders to define target audience and website content strategy.
Wrote clean, maintainable HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code from scratch or by customizing existing templates and packages.
Conducted thorough website testing to identify and resolve bugs, usability issues, and cross-browser inconsistencies.
Maintained and updated existing websites to improve functionality and performance.
Deployed websites to live environments and handled domain registration and server setup.
Registered and optimized websites for search engines to improve visibility (SEO).
Ensured continuous improvement of UI/UX based on feedback and user analytics.
Worked closely with developers, graphic designers, and SEO teams to deliver high-quality web solutions.
